shows.title: Hamza Akram Qawwal & Brothers
shows.desc:
Hamza takes us to the heart of Sufi mysticism with renditions from the qawwali tradition in which his family has been steeped for generations. With songs of love and devotion – both divine and human – his talented ensemble builds an ecstatic state through rhythmic clapping, tabla drumming and powerful vocals, accompanied by the fluid sound of the harmonium.

Supported by Amal –
A Saïd Foundation Programme

shows.title: Qawwali workshop
shows.desc:
Come and learn some of the devotional songs of this age-old Sufi mystical musical form with one of Paksitan’s finest Qawwali ensembles, Hamza Akram Qawwal & Brothers.

Supported by Amal – A Saïd Foundation Programme
